mn83:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā mithilāyaṃ viharati maghadevaambavane.
mn83:2.1: Atha kho bhagavā aññatarasmiṃ padese sitaṃ pātvākāsi.
mn83:2.3: “ko nu kho hetu, ko paccayo bhagavato sitassa pātukammāya?
mn83:2.5: Atha kho āyasmā ānando ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ katvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṃ paṇāmetvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
mn83:2.6: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo bhagavato sitassa pātukammāya?
mn83:3.1: “Bhūtapubbaṃ, ānanda, imissāyeva mithilāyaṃ rājā ahosi maghadevo nāma dhammiko dhammarājā dhamme ṭhito mahārājā;
mn83:3.2: dhammaṃ carati brāhmaṇagahapatikesu negamesu ceva jānapadesu ca;
mn83:3.3: uposathañca upavasati cātuddasiṃ pañcadasiṃ aṭṭhamiñca pakkhassa.
mn83:4.1: Atha kho, ānanda, rājā maghadevo bahūnaṃ vassānaṃ bahūnaṃ vassasatānaṃ bahūnaṃ vassasahassānaṃ accayena kappakaṃ āmantesi:
mn83:4.2: ‘yadā me, samma kappaka, passeyyāsi sirasmiṃ palitāni jātāni, atha me āroceyyāsī’ti.
mn83:4.3: ‘Evaṃ, devā’ti kho, ānanda, kappako rañño maghadevassa paccassosi.
mn83:4.4: Addasā kho, ānanda, kappako bahūnaṃ vassānaṃ bahūnaṃ vassasatānaṃ bahūnaṃ vassasahassānaṃ accayena rañño maghadevassa sirasmiṃ palitāni jātāni.
mn83:4.6: ‘pātubhūtā kho devassa devadūtā, dissanti sirasmiṃ palitāni jātānī’ti.
mn83:4.7: ‘Tena hi, samma kappaka, tāni palitāni sādhukaṃ saṇḍāsena uddharitvā mama añjalismiṃ patiṭṭhāpehī’ti.
mn83:4.8: ‘Evaṃ, devā’ti kho, ānanda, kappako rañño maghadevassa paṭissutvā tāni palitāni sādhukaṃ saṇḍāsena uddharitvā rañño maghadevassa añjalismiṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
mn83:4.9: Atha kho, ānanda, rājā maghadevo kappakassa gāmavaraṃ datvā jeṭṭhaputtaṃ kumāraṃ āmantāpetvā etadavoca:
mn83:4.12: bhuttā kho pana me mānusakā kāmā;
mn83:4.14: Ehi tvaṃ, tāta kumāra, imaṃ rajjaṃ paṭipajja.
mn83:4.15: Ahaṃ pana kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajissāmi.
mn83:4.16: Tena hi, tāta kumāra, yadā tvampi passeyyāsi sirasmiṃ palitāni jātāni, atha kappakassa gāmavaraṃ datvā jeṭṭhaputtaṃ kumāraṃ sādhukaṃ rajje samanusāsitvā kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajeyyāsi.
mn83:4.17: Yena me idaṃ kalyāṇaṃ vattaṃ nihitaṃ anuppavatteyyāsi, mā kho me tvaṃ antimapuriso ahosi.
mn83:4.18: Yasmiṃ kho, tāta kumāra, purisayuge vattamāne evarūpassa kalyāṇassa vattassa samucchedo hoti so tesaṃ antimapuriso hoti.
mn83:4.19: Taṃ tāhaṃ, tāta kumāra, evaṃ vadāmi—
mn83:4.20: yena me idaṃ kalyāṇaṃ vattaṃ nihitaṃ anuppavatteyyāsi, mā kho me tvaṃ antimapuriso ahosī’ti.
mn83:5.1: Atha kho, ānanda, rājā maghadevo kappakassa gāmavaraṃ datvā jeṭṭhaputtaṃ kumāraṃ sādhukaṃ rajje samanusāsitvā imasmiṃyeva maghadevaambavane kesamassuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbaji.
mn83:5.2: So mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā vihāsi, tathā dutiyaṃ, tathā tatiyaṃ, tathā catutthaṃ; iti uddhamadho tiriyaṃ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṃ lokaṃ mettāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyābajjhena pharitvā vihāsi.
mn83:5.5: upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā vihāsi, tathā dutiyaṃ, tathā tatiyaṃ, tathā catutthaṃ; iti uddhamadho tiriyaṃ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṃ lokaṃ upekkhāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyābajjhena pharitvā vihāsi.
mn83:6.1: Rājā kho panānanda, maghadevo caturāsītivassasahassāni kumārakīḷitaṃ kīḷi, caturāsītivassasahassāni oparajjaṃ kāresi, caturāsītivassasahassāni rajjaṃ kāresi, caturāsītivassasahassāni imasmiṃyeva maghadevaambavane agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito brahmacariyamacari.
mn83:6.2: So cattāro brahmavihāre bhāvetvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā brahmalokūpago ahosi.

mn83:10.2: Te mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā vihariṃsu, tathā dutiyaṃ, tathā tatiyaṃ, tathā catutthaṃ; iti uddhamadho tiriyaṃ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṃ lokaṃ mettāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyābajjhena pharitvā vihariṃsu.
mn83:11.3: upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā vihariṃsu, tathā dutiyaṃ, tathā tatiyaṃ, tathā catutthaṃ; iti uddhamadho tiriyaṃ sabbadhi sabbattatāya sabbāvantaṃ lokaṃ upekkhāsahagatena cetasā vipulena mahaggatena appamāṇena averena abyābajjhena pharitvā vihariṃsu.

mn83:11.5: Te cattāro brahmavihāre bhāvetvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā brahmalokūpagā ahesuṃ.
mn83:12.1: Nimi tesaṃ rājā pacchimako ahosi dhammiko dhammarājā dhamme ṭhito mahārājā;
mn83:12.2: dhammaṃ carati brāhmaṇagahapatikesu negamesu ceva jānapadesu ca;
mn83:12.3: uposathañca upavasati cātuddasiṃ pañcadasiṃ aṭṭhamiñca pakkhassa.
mn83:13.1: Bhūtapubbaṃ, ānanda, devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ sudhammāyaṃ sabhāyaṃ sannisinnānaṃ sannipatitānaṃ ayamantarākathā udapādi:
mn83:13.2: ‘lābhā vata, bho, videhānaṃ, suladdhaṃ vata, bho, videhānaṃ,
mn83:13.3: yesaṃ nimi rājā dhammiko dhammarājā dhamme ṭhito mahārājā;
mn83:13.4: dhammaṃ carati brāhmaṇagahapatikesu negamesu ceva jānapadesu ca;
mn83:13.5: uposathañca upavasati cātuddasiṃ pañcadasiṃ aṭṭhamiñca pakkhassā’ti.
mn83:13.6: Atha kho, ānanda, sakko devānamindo deve tāvatiṃse āmantesi:
mn83:13.7: ‘iccheyyātha no tumhe, mārisā, nimiṃ rājānaṃ daṭṭhun’ti?
mn83:13.9: Tena kho pana, ānanda, samayena nimi rājā tadahuposathe pannarase sīsaṃnhāto uposathiko uparipāsādavaragato nisinno hoti.
mn83:13.10: Atha kho, ānanda, sakko devānamindo—seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya, pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya; evameva—devesu tāvatiṃsesu antarahito nimissa rañño pamukhe pāturahosi.
mn83:13.11: Atha kho, ānanda, sakko devānamindo nimiṃ rājānaṃ etadavoca:
mn83:13.13: Devā, mahārāja, tāvatiṃsā sudhammāyaṃ sabhāyaṃ kittayamānarūpā sannisinnā:
mn83:13.14: “lābhā vata, bho, videhānaṃ, suladdhaṃ vata, bho, videhānaṃ,
mn83:13.15: yesaṃ nimi rājā dhammiko dhammarājā dhamme ṭhito mahārājā;
mn83:13.16: dhammaṃ carati brāhmaṇagahapatikesu negamesu ceva jānapadesu ca;
mn83:13.17: uposathañca upavasati cātuddasiṃ pañcadasiṃ aṭṭhamiñca pakkhassā”ti.
mn83:13.19: Tassa te ahaṃ, mahārāja, sahassayuttaṃ ājaññarathaṃ pahiṇissāmi;
mn83:13.21: Adhivāsesi kho, ānanda, nimi rājā tuṇhībhāvena.
mn83:13.22: Atha kho, ānanda, sakko devānamindo nimissa rañño adhivāsanaṃ viditvā—seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya, pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya; evameva—nimissa rañño pamukhe antarahito devesu tāvatiṃsesu pāturahosi.
mn83:14.1: Atha kho, ānanda, sakko devānamindo mātaliṃ saṅgāhakaṃ āmantesi:
mn83:14.2: ‘ehi tvaṃ, samma mātali, sahassayuttaṃ ājaññarathaṃ yojetvā nimiṃ rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ vadehi—
mn83:14.3: ayaṃ te, mahārāja, sahassayutto ājaññaratho sakkena devānamindena pesito;
mn83:14.5: ‘Evaṃ, bhaddantavā’ti kho, ānanda, mātali saṅgāhako sakkassa devānamindassa paṭissutvā sahassayuttaṃ ājaññarathaṃ yojetvā nimiṃ rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca:
mn83:14.6: ‘ayaṃ te, mahārāja, sahassayutto ājaññaratho sakkena devānamindena pesito;
mn83:14.8: Api ca, mahārāja, katamena taṃ nemi, yena vā pāpakammā pāpakānaṃ kammānaṃ vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvedenti, yena vā kalyāṇakammā kalyāṇakammānaṃ vipākaṃ paṭisaṃvedentī’ti?

mn83:15.6: Devā te dassanakāmā, mahārāja, tāvatiṃsā sudhammāyaṃ sabhāyaṃ kittayamānarūpā sannisinnā:

mn83:15.10: uposathañca upavasati cātuddasiṃ pañcadasiṃ aṭṭhamiñca pakkhassā”ti.

mn83:21.1: Siyā kho pana te, ānanda, evamassa:
mn83:21.2: ‘añño nūna tena samayena rājā maghadevo ahosi, yena taṃ kalyāṇaṃ vattaṃ nihitan’ti.
mn83:21.3: Na kho panetaṃ, ānanda, evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
mn83:21.4: Ahaṃ tena samayena rājā maghadevo ahosiṃ.
mn83:21.5: Ahaṃ taṃ kalyāṇaṃ vattaṃ nihiniṃ, mayā taṃ kalyāṇaṃ vattaṃ nihitaṃ;
mn83:21.7: Taṃ kho panānanda, kalyāṇaṃ vattaṃ na nibbidāya na virāgāya na nirodhāya na upasamāya na abhiññāya na sambodhāya na nibbānāya saṃvattati, yāvadeva brahmalokūpapattiyā.
mn83:21.8: Idaṃ kho panānanda, etarahi mayā kalyāṇaṃ vattaṃ nihitaṃ ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
mn83:21.9: Katamañcānanda, etarahi mayā kalyāṇaṃ vattaṃ nihitaṃ ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati?
mn83:21.11: sammādiṭṭhi, sammāsaṅkappo, sammāvācā, sammākammanto, sammāājīvo, sammāvāyāmo, sammāsati, sammāsamādhi.
mn83:21.12: Idaṃ kho, ānanda, etarahi mayā kalyāṇaṃ vattaṃ nihitaṃ ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
mn83:21.13: Taṃ vo ahaṃ, ānanda, evaṃ vadāmi:
mn83:21.14: ‘yena me idaṃ kalyāṇaṃ vattaṃ nihitaṃ anuppavatteyyātha, mā kho me tumhe antimapurisā ahuvattha’.
mn83:21.15: Yasmiṃ kho, ānanda, purisayuge vattamāne evarūpassa kalyāṇassa vattassa samucchedo hoti so tesaṃ antimapuriso hoti.
mn83:21.16: Taṃ vo ahaṃ, ānanda, evaṃ vadāmi:
mn83:21.17: ‘yena me idaṃ kalyāṇaṃ vattaṃ nihitaṃ anuppavatteyyātha, mā kho me tumhe antimapurisā ahuvatthā’”ti.
mn83:21.19: Attamano āyasmā ānando bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandīti.
